resources.string:
1 We’ll back up your Facebook data archive into a personal data vault that only you control. 

2 We’ll give you private analytics on your Facebook data. 

3 Your vault will be updated each week with new Facebook data and insights.
We’ll only use your Facebook login information to automate your back up.

Facebook is preparing your data archive. This may take up to a few days, depending on how much data you have. \n\nWould you like us to notify you when your backup is ready? If not, you will need to return back here regularly to check if the backup is ready.
Allow “Synergy” to send you push notifications?
We’ll notify you when your backup is ready.
